item.title: DOOR U/D Flight Lock Actuators – Freighter without Draw-Through Smoke Detection System

remarks.para: May be inoperative or missing provided each upper deck Type "A" door is verified to be capable of being unlatched before each departure.

numlitem.para: Verify upper deck doors are capable of being latched before each departure.

placard.para: Install Placard below Captain's PFD on P-1-1 on affected door: "__U/D DOOR FLT LK ACT INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

note.para: The repetitive inspection required when this item is inoperative must be documented in the Aircraft Log at the prescribed intervals. (Refer to GMM, Chapter 3, Section 6.)

numlitem.para: If the affected flight lock actuator needs to be removed follow the steps below:
Open and collar the affected (LH)(RH) UPR DK DR FLT LOCK circuit breaker on the P180 panel.
Disconnect, cap and stow flight lock electrical connector.
Verify the upper deck type A door is capable of being unlatched.
Place the mode selector lever in the Manual position.

caution.para: DO NOT RAISE INSIDE HANDLE WHEN DOOR IS IN AUTOMATIC MODE. DOOR WILL OPEN RAPIDLY AND SLIDE WILL BE DEPLOYED AND INFLATED.

numlitem.para: Rotate the inside handle to the open position. Door should translate upward approximately 2 inches.
Rotate the inside handle downward to the latched position.
